Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Reroute near 63rd/Cottage Grove
ShortDescription: 63 63rd buses temp. rerouted near 63rd/ Cottage Grove.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#63 63rd buses temp. rerouted near 63rd/ Cottage Grove.

#63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 63rd/Cottage Grove due to Festival near 63rd/Cottage Grove.

Eastbound buses will operate via 63rd, Indiana, 61st, Cottage Grove, 64th, Maryland and 63rd including the normal route streets.

Westbound buses will operate via 63rd, Cottage Gove, 61st, Prairie and 63rd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Subway Trains Rerouted to Elevated Tracks
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line subway trains are temporarily rerouted to the elevated tracks between Cermak and Fullerton due to track conditions at North/Clybourn.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line subway trains are temporarily rerouted to the elevated tracks between Cermak and Fullerton due to track conditions at North/Clybourn.

Shuttle buses are available from Fullerton to State/Lake to provide connecting service through the affected area,

Train service to Howard

After stopping at Cermak-Chinatown, Howard-bound trains will be diverted and will make the following elevated station stops:

  • Roosevelt (elevated station west of Wabash; accessible)
  • Adams/Wabash
  • Washington/Wabash (accessible)
  • State/Lake
  • Clark/lake (accessible)
  • Merchandise Mart (accessible)
  • Chicago (at Franklin; accessible)
  • Sedgwick (accessible)
  • Armitage (accessible)

Then, trains will stop at Fullerton and make all normal stops to Howard.

Connections can be made between 95th/Dan Ryan-bound subway service and Howard-bound rerouted service via elevated lines at State/Lake (transfer to nearby elevated station, board on Brown Line side) and at Roosevelt (accessible).

We apologize for the inconvenience and are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

95th/Dan Ryan-bound service is not affected.

Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Reroute near Jackson/Hamlin
ShortDescription: 126 Jackson buses temp. rerouted near Jackson/Hamlin.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#126 Jackson buses temp. rerouted near Jackson/Hamlin.

Buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Jackson/Hamlin, due to street blockage near Jackson/Hamlin.

Eastbound buses will operate via Jackson, Pulaski, Harrison, Independence and Jackson including the normal route streets.

Westbound buses will operate via Congress, Pulaski and Jackson.

Allow extra travel time.
